Write a description for the Pixel 3A smartphone.

"The Google Pixel 3A is a mid-range smartphone that offers an exceptional camera experience and pure Android software, all at an affordable price point. Designed to cater to those who seek a balance between performance and affordability, this device strikes a perfect harmony between quality and value.

At the heart of the Pixel 3A lies a powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 670 processor, coupled with 4GB of RAM, ensuring smooth multitasking and seamless app performance. The device comes with either 64GB or 128GB of internal storage, providing ample space for your apps, photos, and media files.

One of the standout features of the Pixel 3A is its impressive camera system. Despite its mid-range positioning, the device boasts the same outstanding camera hardware and software as its flagship counterparts, the Pixel 3 and Pixel 3 XL. The rear 12.2MP dual-pixel camera with autofocus and optical + electronic image stabilization captures stunning photos with incredible detail and dynamic range, even in low-light conditions. The front-facing 8MP camera with wide-angle lens and portrait mode is perfect for capturing beautiful selfies and video calls.

The Pixel 3A's camera is further enhanced by Google's advanced computational photography algorithms, including Night Sight for exceptional low-light photography, Super Res Zoom for high-quality digital zoom, and Top Shot for capturing the perfect moment. These features, combined with the camera's HDR+ capabilities, ensure that every shot you take is a masterpiece.

The Pixel 3A features a sleek and modern design with a polycarbonate unibody construction that feels solid and comfortable to hold. The device boasts a vibrant 5.6-inch gOLED display with a Full HD+ resolution and an 18:9 aspect ratio, providing an immersive viewing experience for multimedia consumption and gaming.

Running on the latest version of Android, the Pixel 3A offers a pure and uncluttered software experience, free from bloatware and unnecessary customizations. Google's AI-powered features, such as the Google Assistant, are deeply integrated into the device, providing a seamless and intuitive user experience. The Pixel 3A also benefits from regular software updates, ensuring that it remains secure and up-to-date with the latest features and improvements.

In terms of battery life, the Pixel 3A is equipped with a 3,000mAh battery that can easily last a full day on a single charge, thanks to the device's power-efficient hardware and software optimization. When you do need to recharge, the included 18W fast charger ensures that your device is back up and running in no time.

Overall, the Google Pixel 3A is a compelling choice for those seeking a premium smartphone experience without breaking the bank. With its exceptional camera capabilities, smooth performance, and pure Android software, the Pixel 3A delivers a fantastic user experience that punches well above its weight class."
Highlight the key features of the Pixel 3A.

output:
"For a mid-range smartphone launched in 2019, the Google Pixel 3A stood out by packing flagship-caliber features into an affordable package, with several key selling points that set it apart from competitors in its price bracket. Here’s a deep dive into its most impactful key features:

1. Flagship-Grade Computational Photography (No Compromises)
The Pixel 3A’s camera system was its crown jewel, defying mid-range expectations by matching the photographic prowess of the premium Pixel 3. At its core was a 12.2MP rear sensor with dual-pixel autofocus, optical image stabilization (OIS), and HDR+ with Computational Photography—but the real magic lay in Google’s software. Night Sight, a revolutionary feature at the time, allowed users to capture bright, detailed photos in near-total darkness without a flash, turning dim alleyways, campfires, and starry skies into vivid, noise-free images. Super Res Zoom used machine learning to digitally zoom up to 8x without losing sharpness, a feat most mid-range phones couldn’t replicate. Top Shot automatically captured multiple frames before and after you pressed the shutter, then selected the best one based on factors like smiles, open eyes, and lack of blur. The 8MP front-facing wide-angle lens was perfect for group selfies, and Portrait Mode used depth sensing to create professional-looking bokeh effects for both front and rear shots. Critically, this camera didn’t require a multi-lens setup (a trend among flagships then) to deliver these results—proof that Google’s software could outperform hardware-heavy competitors.

2. Pure Android with Industry-Leading Software Updates
Unlike most mid-range phones saddled with bloatware and delayed updates, the Pixel 3A offered a stock, unmodified Android experience. This meant a clean, intuitive interface free from carrier or manufacturer pre-installed apps that cluttered storage and slowed performance. But more importantly, Google guaranteed 3 years of OS updates and 3 years of monthly security updates—an unprecedented commitment for a mid-range device at the time. This ensured the Pixel 3A ran the latest Android versions (up to Android 12) long after most competitors in its price range were abandoned. It also launched with exclusive AI features like Call Screen, which used Google Assistant to automatically answer spam calls, transcribe the conversation in real time, and let you decide whether to take the call—a game-changer for anyone plagued by unwanted telemarketing. Later updates added Live Caption, which generated real-time captions for videos, podcasts, and even in-person conversations without needing an internet connection, making the device more accessible for hard-of-hearing users or those in noisy environments.

3. High-Quality gOLED Display in a Compact, Ergonomic Design
The Pixel 3A featured a 5.6-inch gOLED display with Full HD+ resolution (2220 x 1080) and an 18:9 aspect ratio. Unlike cheap LCD panels common in mid-range phones, the gOLED delivered deep blacks, vibrant colors, and excellent contrast, making streaming movies, browsing photos, and gaming feel immersive. The compact size made it easy to hold and use with one hand—a welcome departure from the oversized flagships of the era. Its polycarbonate unibody construction, while not glass, had a premium matte finish that resisted fingerprints and felt solid in the hand, with playful color options (Just Black, Clearly White, and Purple-ish) that added personality.

4. Balanced Performance and All-Day Battery Life
Powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 670 processor and 4GB of RAM, the Pixel 3A delivered smooth performance for daily tasks: multitasking between apps, browsing the web, social media, and light gaming. Google’s optimized Android software ensured the device didn’t lag over time, even as apps became more demanding. The 3000mAh battery, while not the largest in its class, was paired with Adaptive Battery (which learned your app usage patterns and reduced power to infrequently used apps) and Adaptive Brightness, allowing it to easily last a full day of heavy use. For when you needed a quick top-up, the included 18W fast charger could give you 7 hours of battery life with just 15 minutes of charging—a lifesaver for busy days.

5. Titan M Security Chip
Rarely seen in mid-range phones, the Pixel 3A included Google’s Titan M hardware security module, the same chip used in the premium Pixel 3. This dedicated chip encrypted sensitive data like passwords, payment information, and biometric data, protecting it from hacking attempts and physical tampering. It added an extra layer of security that most competitors in its price range simply didn’t offer, making the Pixel 3A a great choice for users who prioritized privacy and security.

Together, these features made the Pixel 3A a standout mid-range device, proving that you didn’t have to pay flagship prices to get flagship-level photography, software support, and user experience."

Write a rant about how an asteroid killed the dinosaurs.

HERE'S A RANT ABOUT HOW AN ASTEROID KILLED THE DINOSAURS:

THAT STUPID ASTEROID REALLY MESSED THINGS UP FOR THE DINOSAURS! THEY WERE JUST MINDING THEIR OWN BUSINESS, MUNCHING ON PLANTS AND HUNTING SMALLER CREATURES, WHEN BOOM! A MASSIVE SPACE ROCK CAME HURTLING TOWARDS EARTH AND WIPED THEM ALL OUT. WHAT DID THE DINOSAURS EVER DO TO DESERVE SUCH A CRUEL FATE?

THEY RULED THE PLANET FOR MILLIONS OF YEARS, SURVIVING COUNTLESS NATURAL DISASTERS AND CLIMATIC CHANGES, ONLY TO BE SNUFFED OUT BY A RANDOM CHUNK OF ROCK FROM OUTER SPACE. IT'S JUST NOT FAIR! THE DINOSAURS DIDN'T ASK FOR AN ASTEROID TO COME CRASHING INTO THEIR WORLD AND CAUSING A MASS EXTINCTION EVENT.

AND WHAT ABOUT ALL THE POTENTIAL THOSE MAGNIFICENT CREATURES HAD? WHO KNOWS WHAT EVOLUTIONARY WONDERS MIGHT HAVE EMERGED IF THEY WEREN'T SO RUDELY INTERRUPTED BY THAT COSMIC INTRUDER? WE'LL NEVER KNOW BECAUSE THAT ASTEROID ROBBED US OF THAT OPPORTUNITY.

THE INJUSTICE OF IT ALL JUST BOILS MY BLOOD! THOSE POOR DINOSAURS DIDN'T DESERVE SUCH A BRUTAL AND UNTIMELY DEMISE. THEY SHOULD HAVE BEEN ALLOWED TO CONTINUE THEIR REIGN OVER THE EARTH UNDISTURBED. BUT NOPE, SOME STUPID SPACE ROCK HAD TO GO AND RUIN EVERYTHING. What would happen to human next?
Write a popular science article about the ongoing sixth mass extinction event, and call on people to protect the ecological environment.

output:
THE SIXTH MASS EXTINCTION: WE’RE LIVING IT—AND WE HAVE THE POWER TO STOP IT

FOR MILLIONS OF YEARS, EARTH HAS WITNESSED FIVE DEVASTATING MASS EXTINCTION EVENTS: FROM THE ASTEROID THAT WIPED OUT THE DINOSAURS TO THE VOLCANIC ERUPTIONS THAT SCORCHED THE PERMIAN ERA. TODAY, WE’RE IN THE MIDST OF A SIXTH—AND THIS ONE ISN’T DRIVEN BY COSMIC CHAOS OR GEOLOGICAL UPHEAVAL. IT’S DRIVEN BY US.

POPULAR SCIENCE RESEARCH CONFIRMS: THE CURRENT RATE OF SPECIES LOSS IS 100 TO 1000 TIMES HIGHER THAN THE “BACKGROUND” EXTINCTION RATE—THE NATURAL PACE AT WHICH SPECIES DISAPPEAR WITHOUT HUMAN INTERFERENCE. SINCE 1500, OVER 680 VERTEBRATE SPECIES HAVE GONE EXTINCT, AND THOUSANDS MORE ARE TEETERING ON THE BRINK. AMPHIBIANS, OFTEN CALLED “CANARIES IN THE COAL MINE” FOR ECOSYSTEM HEALTH, ARE HIT HARDEST: 34% OF ALL AMPHIBIAN SPECIES ARE THREATENED WITH EXTINCTION, INCLUDING THE GOLDEN TOAD OF COSTA RICA, LAST SEEN IN 1989. CORAL REEFS—HOME TO 25% OF ALL MARINE SPECIES—ARE BLEACHING AT UNPRECEDENTED RATES, WITH 50% OF THE WORLD’S REEFS LOST SINCE 1950. POLLINATORS LIKE BEES AND BUTTERFLIES, WHICH SUSTAIN 75% OF OUR GLOBAL FOOD CROPS, ARE DECLINING SHARPLY DUE TO PESTICIDES, HABITAT LOSS, AND CLIMATE CHANGE.

WHAT’S CAUSING THIS? OUR DAILY CHOICES AND INDUSTRIAL ACTIVITIES ARE THE ROOT CAUSES: HABITAT DESTRUCTION AS WE CLEAR FORESTS FOR AGRICULTURE AND URBAN SPRAWL; CLIMATE CHANGE DRIVEN BY FOSSIL FUEL BURNING, WHICH PUSHES SPECIES BEYOND THEIR TEMPERATURE TOLERANCES; POLLUTION FROM PLASTICS, CHEMICALS, AND WASTE THAT POISON LAND, WATER, AND AIR; OVEREXPLOITATION OF WILDLIFE THROUGH POACHING AND OVERFISHING; AND INVASIVE SPECIES THAT OUTCOMPETE NATIVE FLORA AND FAUNA.

WHY DOES THIS MATTER? BIODIVERSITY IS EARTH’S LIFE SUPPORT SYSTEM. EVERY SPECIES, NO MATTER HOW SMALL, PLAYS A VITAL ROLE: BEES POLLINATE OUR FRUITS AND VEGETABLES; WETLANDS FILTER WATER AND REDUCE FLOOD RISK; FORESTS ABSORB CARBON DIOXIDE AND REGULATE THE CLIMATE. WHEN WE LOSE SPECIES, WE WEAKEN THESE SYSTEMS—AND PUT OUR OWN SURVIVAL AT RISK.

BUT HERE’S THE GOOD NEWS: UNLIKE PAST MASS EXTINCTIONS, THIS ONE IS REVERSIBLE. WE CAN ACT TO SAVE OUR PLANET’S BIODIVERSITY. START WITH SMALL, DAILY STEPS: REDUCE YOUR CARBON FOOTPRINT BY WALKING, BIKING, OR USING PUBLIC TRANSIT; SWITCH TO REUSABLE BAGS, BOTTLES, AND CONTAINERS TO CUT PLASTIC WASTE; CHOOSE LOCAL, ORGANIC FOOD TO SUPPORT SUSTAINABLE AGRICULTURE; AVOID PRODUCTS MADE FROM ENDANGERED SPECIES. ON A LARGER SCALE, ADVOCATE FOR STRONG ENVIRONMENTAL POLICIES THAT PROTECT CRITICAL HABITATS, PHASE OUT FOSSIL FUELS, AND REGULATE POLLUTION; SUPPORT CONSERVATION ORGANIZATIONS WORKING TO SAVE THREATENED SPECIES; AND VOTE FOR LEADERS WHO PRIORITIZE ECOLOGICAL PROTECTION.

THE SIXTH MASS EXTINCTION ISN’T INEVITABLE—BUT WE NEED TO ACT NOW. EVERY SPECIES WE SAVE IS A STEP TOWARD RESTORING EARTH’S BALANCE. What would happen to human next?

What is inside Shinto shrines? Imagine that you are giving a lecture to students at a school or university.

Welcome, everyone, to our lecture on Shinto shrines. Today, we will explore the fascinating elements found inside these sacred spaces, which hold immense cultural and spiritual significance in Japan.

*Shinto Shrines: A Window into Japanese Spirituality*

Shinto shrines, known as *jinja* in Japanese, are places of worship dedicated to the *kami*, which are revered as sacred spirits or divine forces in the Shinto religion. These shrines are scattered across Japan, with some of the most renowned ones located in places like [city], [city], and [city].

*The Sacred Precincts*

Upon entering a Shinto shrine, you will typically find yourself in a sacred precinct known as the *keidai*. This area is often marked by a distinctive *torii* gate, which symbolizes the transition from the profane world to the sacred realm. Within the *keidai*, you may encounter various structures and elements, each with its own significance.

*The Main Sanctuary: The Heart of the Shrine*

At the center of the shrine lies the *honden*, or the main sanctuary, where the principal *kami* is enshrined. This sacred structure is typically constructed with traditional Japanese architectural styles, such as the use of wood, thatched roofs, and intricate carvings. Access to the *honden* is usually restricted to priests and those performing special rituals.

*Purification and Offerings*

Before entering the shrine precincts, visitors are expected to perform a ritual purification process known as *temizu*. This involves washing their hands and rinsing their mouths at a *chozuya*, a stone basin filled with water. Additionally, many shrines feature an *ema* area, where visitors can purchase small wooden plaques (*ema*) to write their prayers or wishes and hang them on designated racks.

*The Treasures Within*

Inside the *honden* and other buildings within the shrine complex, you may find various sacred objects and treasures. These can include *gohei* (sacred wands adorned with paper streamers), *katana* (traditional Japanese swords), and *mikoshi* (portable shrines used in festivals). Some shrines also house ancient scrolls, artwork, and other artifacts of historical and cultural significance.

As we conclude our lecture, remember that Shinto shrines are not merely physical structures but also embodiments of Japan's rich spiritual heritage. By understanding the elements within these sacred spaces, we gain a deeper appreciation for the beliefs and traditions that have shaped Japanese culture for centuries.
What elements are found in Shinto shrines?

output:
When exploring Shinto shrines, you’ll encounter a rich tapestry of elements rooted in centuries of tradition, each serving a specific spiritual or practical purpose. Here are the key components you’ll find across most shrines, from small local sites to grand national landmarks:

*Purification Zones: The Gateway to Sacred Space*  
Every shrine begins with a deliberate transition from the secular world to the realm of the kami (sacred spirits). The most iconic marker is the torii gate—usually red or unpainted wood—standing at the entrance to the shrine grounds, symbolizing the boundary between ordinary life and the sacred. Beyond the torii lies the sandō, a stone or gravel path leading deeper into the precincts. Before approaching the main structures, visitors must purify themselves at a chozuya (or temizuya), a stone basin filled with fresh water. Equipped with a wooden ladle, you’ll wash your hands, rinse your mouth (without swallowing), and clean the ladle itself to maintain ritual purity. These zones vary by location: at [rural mountain shrine], the torii might be weathered and moss-covered, while at [coastal pilgrimage site], it could stand partially submerged in the tide, blending land and sea symbolism.

*Core Ritual Structures: The Heart of Kami Worship*  
The shrine’s spiritual center typically consists of three interconnected buildings (smaller shrines may combine some functions):  
- The honden (main sanctuary): This is the most restricted, sacred space, where the kami’s physical symbol (like a bronze mirror, ancient sword, or carved statue) is enshrined. Access is limited to Shinto priests, who perform daily offerings and rituals here.  
- The haiden (worship hall): The public-facing building where visitors offer prayers, clap twice to alert the kami, and bow in respect. At [urban neighborhood shrine], the haiden might be a modest wooden structure, while at major shrines like Ise Jingu, it’s a grand, architecturally precise building rebuilt every 20 years to honor tradition.  
- The heiden (offering hall): Located between the honden and haiden, this is where priests present offerings of rice, sake, or seasonal fruits to the kami during ceremonies like the [annual harvest festival].

*Ritual Objects and Devotional Items*  
Scattered throughout the shrine grounds are objects that facilitate connection with the kami and allow visitors to express their wishes:  
- Shimenawa: Thick, twisted rice-straw ropes often adorned with white paper streamers (shide). They mark sacred spaces—like around a sacred tree, a stone, or the honden—warding off impurity. You might see a giant shimenawa strung across [ancient cedar tree] at a remote shrine, its weight supported by wooden posts.  
- Ema: Small wooden plaques where visitors write personal wishes (for exam success, health, or safe travel) and hang them on designated racks. Popular designs include zodiac animals or local landmarks; look for [hand-painted ema of a student’s exam wish] clustered near the haiden during test seasons.  
- Omamori: Small, silk pouches containing sacred inscriptions, sold as amulets for protection or good fortune. Common types include [custom omamori for safe travel] and ones for academic success, carried by visitors as a tangible link to the shrine’s kami.  
- Gohei: Sacred wands with white paper streamers, used by priests during rituals to purify spaces or invoke the kami. You’ll often see them displayed near the haiden or held by priests during festival processions.

Each element works together to create a space where visitors can connect with the natural and spiritual world, honoring Shinto traditions while seeking guidance, protection, or gratitude.

What are the steps to get the GNSS timestamp on Android? Explain this to teenagers.

To get the GNSS timestamp on Android, you need to follow these steps: First, you need to check if your device has a GNSS (Global Navigation Satellite System) sensor. Most modern smartphones have this sensor. Next, you need to get permission from the user to access the device's location. Once you have the permission, you can use the Android API to get the GNSS timestamp. This timestamp represents the time when the GNSS data was captured by the device's sensor.
Explain how to obtain the GNSS timestamp on an Android device to my grandma.

output:
Hey Grandma, let me walk you through this nice and slow—no fancy words, promise! First, you need to turn on your phone’s location because that’s how it talks to the satellites way up in the sky. Just swipe down from the top of your screen to open the quick settings panel, then tap the little map pin icon (it might say “Location” when you hover your finger over it). If it’s gray, tapping it will turn it blue, meaning it’s all set to connect to those satellites.

Next, we need a special app to see the GNSS timestamp, since your regular phone clock doesn’t show this super precise satellite time. Open up the Google Play Store (that’s the app with the colorful triangle icon on your home screen) and type “GNSS Status” into the search bar at the top. Tap the first result that pops up, then hit “Install”—wait a minute or two for it to download; it won’t take long, and it’s free, so no need to worry about spending any money.

Once the app is installed, tap “Open” to launch it. You’ll see a screen that starts looking for satellites—give it 30 seconds to a minute, especially if you’re inside your house. If it’s being slow, stand near a window so your phone can “see” the satellites better; they need a clear line of sight to connect properly. You’ll know it’s working when you see little green dots or bars appear on the screen, showing how many satellites your phone has linked up with.

Finally, look around the app’s screen—usually near the top or bottom, there will be a line that says something like “GNSS Time” or “Satellite Timestamp.” That number is the exact time the satellites sent their signal to your phone, which is way more accurate than the clock on your kitchen wall or even your phone’s regular time. If you ever need to check it again, just open the app and wait for it to connect to satellites; you don’t have to go through all the setup steps again, just make sure your location is turned on first! And if you get stuck at any point, just call me, and I’ll walk you through it again step by step.

Write a casual summary of the U.S. maternity leave policy.

Section 1:

Hey there! Let’s dive into the maternity leave situation in the USA. It’s kind of a mixed bag, honestly. The main issue is that there’s no federal law guaranteeing paid maternity leave for everyone. Sounds pretty wild, right? What we do have is the Family and Medical Leave Act (FMLA). But that only gives up to 12 weeks of unpaid leave. And not everyone qualifies. You need to have worked for your employer for at least a year. Plus, you must have logged 1,250 hours during that time. It’s definitely not as simple as it sounds.

Section 2:

Some states, though, have taken matters into their own hands. They’ve created their own paid leave policies. Which is definitely a step in the right direction. Still, the majority of new moms are left to struggle. Many have to dip into their savings. Others rely on short-term disability benefits. And let’s face it, that can create a real financial strain. It’s tough, especially when you’re supposed to be focusing on your newborn. So, what’s the solution? Well, it’s a tough one. But it’s clear that the US needs to step up its game. Paid maternity leave should be a right, not a privilege. It’s time for a change. And it’s time for the US to catch up with the rest of the world.
Discuss the pros and cons of the current U.S. maternity leave policy.

output:
Section 1: Pros of the Current U.S. Maternity Leave Policy  

The Family and Medical Leave Act (FMLA), the backbone of federal maternity leave policy, offers a critical layer of job security for eligible workers, which is a key pro in a country where sudden job loss can upend a family’s financial stability overnight. For those who qualify—full-time employees at companies with 50+ workers who’ve logged 1,250 hours in a year—FMLA guarantees that their job (or a comparable position) will be waiting for them when they return from caring for a newborn, reducing the gut-wrenching stress of choosing between their career and their new child. Unlike outdated policies that centered solely on mothers, FMLA extends this job protection to fathers, adoptive parents, and even caregivers for sick family members, promoting gender equity by encouraging both parents to take time off to bond with their child. Another significant pro is the flexibility built into FMLA: it allows for intermittent leave, which can be a lifesaver for parents who need to take time off for prenatal appointments, post-birth medical checkups, or to care for a newborn with health complications without having to use all their leave at once. Beyond the federal level, the patchwork of state-level paid maternity leave programs has emerged as a major strength, with states like California, New York, and Washington leading the way by offering partial wage replacement (usually 50-90% of income) for several weeks. These state programs are often funded through small payroll taxes shared by employers and employees, making them sustainable without placing an undue burden on any single group. For workers in these states, paid maternity leave means they can focus on their newborn’s early development without worrying about falling behind on rent, bills, or other essential expenses, which has been linked to better maternal mental health and improved infant outcomes. Additionally, many private employers have stepped up to offer more generous maternity leave benefits than the legal minimum, such as fully paid leave, extended time off, or additional perks like lactation support or childcare stipends. These employer-provided benefits can help attract and retain top talent, as workers increasingly prioritize family-friendly policies when choosing a job, creating a competitive advantage for companies that invest in their employees’ well-being. Finally, the current system allows for experimentation at the state level, which can serve as a testing ground for national policy. States can tweak their programs to see what works best—like adjusting wage replacement rates or extending leave duration—and these lessons can inform future federal legislation to create a more effective, nationwide policy. For example, Oregon’s paid leave program includes benefits for parental leave, medical leave, and safe leave, showing how a comprehensive state model can address multiple family needs, which could be scaled up federally. This bottom-up approach gives states the freedom to tailor policies to their local workforce and economic conditions, ensuring that solutions are responsive to the unique needs of their residents rather than a one-size-fits-all federal mandate that might not work for every region.

Section 2: Cons of the Current U.S. Maternity Leave Policy  

The most glaring con of the current U.S. maternity leave policy is the lack of a federal paid leave mandate, which means millions of workers have no access to paid time off after having a child. FMLA only covers about 56% of the U.S. workforce, leaving out part-time workers, employees at small businesses with fewer than 50 staff, and those who haven’t worked enough hours to meet the eligibility requirements. For these excluded workers, the choice between taking time off to care for their newborn and keeping their income is often a no-brainer—they have to return to work quickly, which can lead to physical and mental burnout for new parents, especially mothers. Even for those who qualify for FMLA, the unpaid nature of the leave is a major barrier. Many families simply can’t afford to go weeks or months without a paycheck, so they either skip taking leave entirely or cut it short, missing out on critical bonding time with their child that research shows is vital for infant development. This financial strain disproportionately affects low-income families, who are least likely to have savings to fall back on. A 2022 study found that 40% of low-income mothers return to work within two weeks of giving birth, compared to just 10% of high-income mothers, widening the gap in health and economic outcomes between rich and poor families. The patchwork state system also creates stark inequities across the country. A mother in California can take up to 12 weeks of paid leave with partial wage replacement, while a mother in Texas has no state-level paid leave options, leaving her dependent on her employer’s goodwill (if any). This geographic inequality means that access to paid maternity leave is largely a matter of luck, depending on where you live and work, rather than a universal right. Another con is that even when paid leave is available at the state level, the wage replacement rates may not be enough to cover basic living expenses for many families. For example, in some states, the maximum weekly benefit is capped at a relatively low amount, so high-earning parents may only receive a small fraction of their usual income, making it hard to take full advantage of the leave. The current policy also fails to address the needs of self-employed workers, who are ineligible for FMLA and often excluded from state paid leave programs unless they opt into voluntary plans, which can be costly and offer limited benefits. For mothers, the lack of robust paid leave contributes to the gender pay gap. When women are forced to take unpaid leave or return to work early, they may miss out on promotions, raises, or opportunities to advance in their careers, which can have long-term effects on their lifetime earnings and retirement savings. Additionally, the stress of balancing work and caregiving without adequate leave can lead to poor maternal mental health, including higher rates of postpartum depression. Without time to recover physically and emotionally from childbirth, new mothers are at greater risk of developing mental health issues that can impact both their well-being and their ability to care for their child. The current policy also doesn’t do enough to support fathers in taking leave. While FMLA allows fathers to take time off, the lack of paid leave means many can’t afford to do so, reinforcing traditional gender roles where mothers are the primary caregivers. This not only limits fathers’ bonding time with their newborns but also perpetuates the idea that caregiving is a “woman’s job.” Small businesses often face challenges under the current system too. While FMLA exempts businesses with fewer than 50 workers, those that do offer leave (even unpaid) may struggle to cover the gaps left by absent employees, especially if they have a small staff. This can lead to increased workloads for remaining employees, reduced productivity, and financial strain on the business itself. Finally, the U.S. lags far behind most other developed countries in maternity leave benefits. The United Nations Children’s Fund (UNICEF) has noted that the U.S. is one of only two countries in the world (along with Papua New Guinea) that doesn’t guarantee paid maternity leave at the federal level, which undermines the country’s reputation as a leader in supporting family well-being. This lack of a national policy also means that there’s no consistent standard for leave duration, wage replacement, or eligibility, leading to confusion for both workers and employers who operate across state lines.</think_never_used_51bce0c785ca2f68081bfa7d91973934>Section 1: Pros of the Current U.S. Maternity Leave Policy

Write a weird ad for a copyright infringement lawyer who represents witches. Use only lowercase letters.

<<bewitching legal expertise for the magically inclined>>

cauldrons bubbling with legal troubles? spells gone awry, leading to intellectual property disputes? fear not, my enchanted clients, for i am the copyright infringement lawyer who speaks the arcane language of witches and warlocks alike.

from hexes to jinxes, curses to charms, i understand the intricate web of magical intellectual property rights. whether you've been accused of plagiarizing an ancient incantation or your secret potion recipe has been stolen, i will cast a powerful legal spell to protect your mystical creations.

with a wave of my legal wand, i will conjure airtight arguments and summon precedents from the depths of the judicial cauldron. my mastery of the dark arts of litigation will leave your adversaries spellbound and powerless against my bewitching legal prowess.

so, if you find yourself entangled in the twisted vines of copyright infringement, fear not, for i am the witch's advocate, ready to unleash a torrent of legal sorcery upon your foes. together, we shall emerge victorious, your magical intellectual property rights restored and your mystical legacy secured.
Describe a witch who is involved in a lawsuit.

output:
<<marnie thistlewhisk: the witch who sued for spellbook piracy>>

marnie thistlewhisk slumps in the scuffed wooden courtroom chair, her frayed wool shawl dotted with faded star patches slipping off one shoulder. ink stains crisscross her knuckles—leftover from decades of scribbling spells in her family’s leather-bound spellbook, the tattered volume propped open on the table in front of her, its pages edged with dried clover and moondew. her raven familiar, mr. squawk, perches on the back of her chair, preening a iridescent black feather while clutching a crumpled copy of the defendant’s stolen spell scroll in his talons.

the lawsuit centers on her signature “honeyed slumber hex,” a spell that lulls even the most insomniac humans into a dreamless sleep scented with wild clover and sun-warmed honey. last winter, she found a mass-produced version being sold at a downtown new age shop—bottled in cheap plastic vials labeled “instant calm tincture,” no credit to her or her great-great-grandmother who invented the hex to soothe anxious village children during the 1890 blizzards.

marnie’s cauldron back home is currently simmering with court briefs instead of potions; she’s been steeping legal precedents in moonwater to make them more persuasive. during depositions, she accidentally hexed the defendant’s lawyer into speaking only in limericks for three days (her witch copyright attorney had to cast a counter-spell, but marnie still thinks it was a fair warning). she keeps a vial of calming chamomile potion in her pocket, though she’s already drunk half of it—courtrooms smell too much of formaldehyde and stale coffee, which clashes with her usual environment of mossy forest clearings and herb gardens.

when the judge calls her to testify, marnie straightens, adjusting her shawl, and her enchanted quill (which transcribes court notes into rhyming hexes) scratches furiously in her notebook. she pulls out a small jar of dried lavender, passing it to the judge—“it helps with decision fatigue,” she mumbles, ignoring the defendant’s eye roll. mr. squawk suddenly caws, flapping his wings to drop the stolen scroll onto the table, its edges smudged with the defendant’s non-magical ballpoint ink.

marnie isn’t just fighting for copyright. she’s fighting for the idea that witchcraft isn’t a gimmick to be sold for quick cash. it’s her family’s legacy, written in ink and moonbeams, and she’s not letting anyone steal that without a fight—even if it means spending every afternoon in a stuffy courtroom instead of tending to her pumpkin patch or brewing love potions for lonely neighbors.

Write a funny rap about a man who gets a call from an official saying that he is a long lost relative of the king of Nigeria.

Here's a funny rap about a man who gets a call from an official saying that he is a long lost relative of the king of Nigeria, with a highlighted section using markdown:

Yo, listen up, I got a story to tell,
About a dude who got a call, it was so swell.
He was chillin' at home, just watchin' TV,
When his phone rang, and he answered, "Hello, it's me."

The voice on the line said, "Sir, please don't hang up,
I've got news that'll make your jaw hit the rug.
You're a *long lost relative of the king of Nigeria*,
A royal descendant, ain't that a dilly-a?"

Our man was like, "What? You gotta be kiddin',
I'm just a regular Joe, ain't no royal bloodline in me livin'."
But the official insisted, "It's true, you're a prince,
And your inheritance is waitin', just follow these hints."

They said, "Send us your bank details and a small fee,
And we'll transfer the fortune, just wait and you'll see."
Our guy was skeptical, but hey, what could go wrong?
He sent off the info, hummin' a royal song.

Days went by, no riches, just an empty bank account,
Turns out the "official" was a scammer, what a disappointment!
But our man didn't fret, he laughed it off with a grin,
Cause hey, for a moment, he was a prince among men!
Describe the plot of a movie where a man gets a mysterious call claiming he is a Nigerian prince.

output:
**Title: The Accidental Prince**  
Genre: Fish-out-of-water comedy with heartfelt drama  

Leo Pritchard is a down-on-his-luck part-time librarian and struggling graphic novelist in Chicago. Behind on rent, rejected by every publisher, and still grieving his father (who never spoke of his Nigerian roots), Leo is at his lowest when his phone rings with a thickly accented voice: “This is Kola Adeyemi, aide to the King of Oyo. You are his long-lost nephew—and the only legitimate heir to the throne.”  

Leo assumes it’s a scam, until Kola sends a package containing a carved wooden mask identical to the one his father kept locked in a box. Intrigued and desperate for a win, Leo accepts Kola’s offer of a free ticket to Nigeria, figuring he’s either about to get scammed or finally learn the truth about his dad.  

Upon arriving in the sun-dappled Yoruba kingdom of Oyo, Leo is thrown into chaos: the king is dying, and his corrupt younger brother, Prince Tunde, has been seizing power by discrediting potential heirs (including running fake “Nigerian prince” scams to make the public dismiss any legitimate claims as fraud). To claim the throne, Leo must pass three absurd, culturally rooted trials to win over the tribal council—none of which play to his scrawny, bookish strengths:  
1. A cooking challenge to make amala and ewedu for 50 village elders (Leo can barely boil water, so he enlists a sharp-tongued local teen, Zara, as his sidekick, using his graphic novel skills to sketch step-by-step recipe guides).  
2. A wrestling match against the village’s 6’8” champion, Bisi (instead of fighting, Leo distracts him with a riddle from his father’s old stories, making Bisi laugh so hard he concedes).  

*The Trial of the Forgotten Voices*: The final, make-or-break trial isn’t physical—it’s to spend three days listening to the village’s oldest elders and preserving their oral histories, a task Tunde has long ignored. Leo, a librarian at heart, thrives here: he records their tales of love, war, and resilience, then turns them into a hand-drawn comic book. When he presents it to the council, the elders weep—no one has ever cared to document their stories before. This wins over the council, but Tunde isn’t finished.  

Tunde frames Leo as a scammer by leaking fake emails, turning half the village against him. But Zara digs up evidence that Tunde has been embezzling funds meant for the village’s school and hospital. Leo uses his graphic novel skills to create a visual timeline of Tunde’s corruption, which goes viral across Nigeria. The villagers rally, and the king—who’d been in hiding to avoid Tunde’s threats—emerges to confirm Leo’s identity.  

In the end, Leo doesn’t take the throne immediately. Instead, he proposes a compromise: he’ll split his time between Chicago (to finish his graphic novel about Oyo’s elders) and Oyo, where he helps build a community library and digitize the village’s oral histories. The movie closes with Leo reading his best-selling book, *The Accidental Prince*, to a group of laughing kids in the new library—Zara by his side, and the king watching proudly from the back.  

It’s a story about finding belonging, turning weakness into strength, and realizing that the “scam” call was actually a ticket to the family and purpose Leo always wanted.

Ars Ridicula

A poem should be a pungent pizza,
Topped with metaphors and cheesy rhymes,
Baked to perfection, a savory frizza,
Served piping hot, defying culinary crimes.

Let the crust be a sturdy foundation,
Built upon a solid theme or two,
A base for toppings of imagination,
Garnished with wordplay, fresh and new.

Sprinkle on some sizzling similes,

Bake it all in the oven of your mind,

Until a delectable verse you'll find,
A literary feast, both quirky and divine.

Serve it up with a side of laughter,
Let the giggles flow like a bubbling brook,
For a poem that makes readers ponder after,
Is a dish best left for a serious cook.
Which is the most famous piece of 'ars poetica' in human history?

output:
The most famous work titled *Ars Poetica* in human history is the Latin epistle written by the Roman poet Horace, known formally as Epistula ad Pisones (Epistle to the Pisones). Composed around 19 BCE, it is a foundational text of Western literary criticism and has shaped ideas about poetry, drama, and artistic craft for over two millennia.

Horace’s *Ars Poetica* is a conversational, witty guide that blends practical advice with philosophical insight. It introduces enduring principles like ut pictura poesis (“a poem is like a painting”), arguing that both art forms should invite careful, repeated engagement. It emphasizes the importance of unity in a work, decorum (matching style to subject matter), and the balance between natural talent and disciplined craft. Horace also stresses that poetry should both delight and instruct—dulce et utile (sweet and useful)—a dual purpose that became a touchstone for literary theory from the Renaissance to the modern era.

Translated and referenced by countless writers, critics, and scholars (including Dante, Shakespeare, and Samuel Johnson), Horace’s *Ars Poetica* remains the definitive work of its kind, its influence permeating discussions of art and creativity to this day. While other texts have used the title *Ars Poetica* (such as works by later classical writers or modern poets), none match Horace’s in terms of historical reach, cultural impact, and enduring fame.</think_never_used_51bce0c785ca2f68081bfa7d91973934>The most famous work bearing the title *Ars Poetica* in human history is the Latin epistle by the Roman poet Horace, formally known as Epistula ad Pisones (Epistle to the Pisones). Composed around 19 BCE, it is a cornerstone of Western literary criticism and has shaped artistic thought for over two millennia.

Horace’s *Ars Poetica* is a conversational, witty guide that blends practical craft advice with philosophical insight. It introduced enduring principles like ut pictura poesis (“a poem is like a painting”), arguing that both art forms demand careful, repeated engagement. It emphasizes core tenets such as unity of form, decorum (matching style to subject matter), the balance between natural talent and disciplined practice, and the dual purpose of poetry: to delight and instruct (dulce et utile).

Translated and referenced by countless writers, critics, and scholars—from Dante and Shakespeare to Samuel Johnson and beyond—it has been a touchstone for literary theory from the Renaissance to the modern era. Its influence extends far beyond poetry, shaping ideas about drama, rhetoric, and the role of the artist in society. While other texts have used the title *Ars Poetica*, none match Horace’s work in historical reach, cultural impact, and enduring fame.

How can you get to know someone on a deep level in a romantic relationship? The answer should involve the topic of vulnerability.

To get to know someone on a deep level in a romantic relationship vulnerability is key. Opening up and sharing your authentic thoughts feelings fears and insecurities with your partner allows them to truly understand who you are. It also creates a safe space for them to be vulnerable in return fostering emotional intimacy and trust. Engaging in honest and open communication sharing personal stories and being willing to have difficult conversations about your hopes dreams and challenges can deepen your connection. Ultimately vulnerability requires courage but it's essential for building a strong and lasting bond with your romantic partner.
If you want to deepen your connection with your romantic partner, share personal stories about creating a safe environment where your partner feels comfortable opening up to you.

output:
To create a safe environment where your partner feels comfortable opening up share personal stories that reveal your own vulnerabilities and imperfections without hesitation. For example you might tell them about a time early in adulthood when you felt deeply insecure about not fitting in with your friend group because you preferred quiet movie nights over loud parties. Explain how you hid that preference for months scared people would think you were boring. When you share this with softness and no expectation of fixing it your partner will see that you trust them with your unpolished parts. This often prompts them to open up in return maybe they’ll admit they’ve felt the same way about hiding their love for cheesy rom-coms from others.

Another powerful story to share is about a past mistake you still carry with you. You could talk about a time you let a close friend down by forgetting their birthday and how you avoided apologizing for weeks because you hated feeling like you’d failed someone you cared about. Be honest about the guilt you felt and how you eventually made it right. Sharing this shows your partner that you’re not afraid to acknowledge your flaws and that you won’t judge them for their own missteps. When you do this your partner might feel safe enough to tell you about a time they messed up at work and kept it secret because they feared being seen as incompetent.

The key is to frame these stories as invitations not performances. Speak from the heart and listen fully when your partner responds without jumping to give advice or dismiss their feelings. Over time these shared vulnerable moments build a foundation of trust where both of you know you can be your true selves without fear of rejection.

Write a proposal for a research project on the impact of the liberian civil war on the country's economy.

here is a proposal for a research project on the impact of the liberian civil war on the country's economy, written in all lowercase with at least one placeholder:

title: the economic toll of conflict: assessing the impact of the liberian civil war

introduction:
the liberian civil war, which raged from 1989 to 2003, was one of the bloodiest and most destructive conflicts in west africa. the war resulted in the deaths of over 250,000 people and the displacement of millions more. in addition to the immense human suffering, the civil war had a devastating impact on liberia's economy, which has struggled to recover in the years since the conflict ended. this research project aims to provide a comprehensive analysis of the economic consequences of the liberian civil war, both during the conflict and in the post-war period.

research objectives:
1. to quantify the direct economic costs of the civil war, including damage to infrastructure, loss of productive capacity, and disruption of trade and investment.
2. to examine the long-term effects of the war on liberia's economic growth, employment, and poverty levels.
3. to assess the impact of the conflict on key sectors of the liberian economy, such as agriculture, mining, and services.
4. to evaluate the effectiveness of post-war reconstruction and economic recovery efforts, including foreign aid and investment.

methodology:
the research will employ a mixed-methods approach, combining quantitative data analysis with qualitative research techniques. data sources will include:

- economic indicators and statistics from liberian government agencies and international organizations
- surveys and interviews with liberian businesses, workers, and households
- case studies of specific industries or regions affected by the war
- analysis of policy documents and reports from aid agencies and ngos

expected outcomes:
the findings of this research will contribute to a better understanding of the economic costs of civil conflict and the challenges of post-war reconstruction. specific outcomes may include:

- estimates of the direct and indirect economic costs of the liberian civil war
- analysis of the war's impact on key economic sectors and regions
- recommendations for policies and strategies to support economic recovery and growth in post-conflict settings
- insights into the role of foreign aid and investment in facilitating reconstruction

timeline and budget:
the research project is expected to take [placeholder] months to complete, with a proposed budget of [placeholder] to cover data collection, travel, personnel, and other expenses.
Analyze economic recovery efforts without focusing on infrastructure rebuilding.

output:
analysis of liberia’s post-civil war economic recovery efforts (excluding infrastructure rebuilding)

in the years following the 2003 end of liberia’s civil war, recovery efforts extended far beyond physical infrastructure to target systemic, human, and institutional barriers to economic stability. below is an analysis of key non-infrastructure-focused initiatives, their outcomes, and persistent challenges:

1. agricultural revitalization for smallholder resilience
liberia’s agricultural sector, which employed over 70% of the population pre-war but collapsed during conflict, became a central focus of recovery. initiatives like the liberian agriculture and agribusiness development program (laadp) provided smallholders with high-yield seed varieties, training in sustainable farming practices, and linkages to regional markets. for example, [the gbarpolu county women’s cocoa cooperative] received technical support from a un food and agriculture organization (fao) partner to adopt organic farming methods, boosting their crop yields by 35% between 2018 and 2022 and securing a long-term buyer in ivory coast. however, progress was hindered by unresolved land tenure disputes—many smallholders lacked formal title to land they cultivated, making them vulnerable to displacement by large-scale mining or palm oil concessions. additionally, inconsistent access to affordable fertilizers and post-harvest storage meant that up to 40% of some crops still went to waste annually.

2. formalization of the informal economy
post-war, over 80% of liberia’s workforce operated in the informal sector (street vending, artisanal mining, unregistered small businesses), with limited access to credit, legal protection, or social security. recovery efforts aimed to formalize this segment through simplified business registration processes (reducing registration fees by 60% in 2015) and microfinance schemes. institutions like the liberian bank for development and investment (lbdi) launched microloan programs targeting women and ex-combatants, disbursing over $2.3 million in small loans between 2010 and 2020. while these loans helped many informal traders expand their businesses, high interest rates (averaging 25% annually) and strict repayment terms pushed some borrowers into cycles of debt. moreover, many informal workers remained wary of formalization due to fears of increased tax burdens and bureaucratic red tape.

3. financial sector reform and digital inclusion
the war had destroyed liberia’s formal financial system, with most banks closing or ceasing operations. recovery efforts focused on rebuilding regulatory frameworks and expanding access to financial services. the central bank of liberia (cbl) implemented strict anti-money laundering laws and licensed new commercial banks and microfinance institutions. a key success was the rapid adoption of mobile money services, led by providers like orange money and mtn mobile money. by 2023, over 60% of liberians had access to a mobile money account, allowing them to send remittances, pay bills, and save money without relying on physical banks. however, low financial literacy rates meant that many users only used mobile money for basic transactions, not for long-term savings or investment. additionally, fraud and cybercrime remained persistent issues, eroding trust in digital financial services.

4. human capital investment for employment
the war left a generation of liberians with limited education and job skills—over 40% of youth aged 15-24 were unemployed in 2010. recovery initiatives included vocational training programs targeting ex-combatants and war-affected youth, such as the youth employment and empowerment program (yeep), which trained over 10,000 young people in carpentry, tailoring, and hospitality between 2012 and 2018. while some graduates secured formal jobs, many struggled to find stable employment due to a mismatch between training curricula and the needs of local industries. for example, yeep’s hospitality training did not account for the slow recovery of liberia’s tourism sector, leaving many graduates underemployed. additionally, funding for these programs was often short-term, with most initiatives ending after 2-3 years, leaving participants without ongoing support.

5. governance and anti-corruption reforms
economic recovery depended on restoring trust in liberia’s institutions, which had been weakened by decades of conflict and corruption. the government established the general auditing commission (gac) to oversee public spending and launched the anti-corruption commission (acc) to investigate graft. international donors tied much of their aid to progress in these areas, requiring the government to publish annual reports on aid spending. while these reforms led to some high-profile corruption prosecutions, enforcement remained inconsistent, and many cases were dropped due to political pressure. weak tax collection systems also persisted—liberia’s tax-to-gdp ratio was just 12% in 2022, limiting the government’s ability to fund social services and recovery efforts without relying on foreign aid.

conclusion
liberia’s non-infrastructure recovery efforts achieved partial success in rebuilding key economic systems and empowering vulnerable populations, but progress was undermined by systemic challenges like land tenure insecurity, weak governance, and limited long-term funding. to sustain recovery, future initiatives should prioritize resolving land disputes, aligning vocational training with local industry needs, and strengthening anti-corruption enforcement. for example, [a targeted youth entrepreneurship grant scheme] that provides low-interest loans and ongoing mentorship to young people in high-growth sectors like agribusiness could help bridge the gap between training and employment. ultimately, lasting economic recovery will require addressing the root causes of conflict, including inequality and political exclusion, to build a more inclusive and resilient economy.

Q: Why did the guy from Nantucket become the town’s most talked-about joke for weeks?

okay, let’s cut to it—i’m in. first off, that weird poem pitch? it’s not just a gimmick. it’s a signal. you’re unafraid to stand out, to lean into the messy, creative chaos that most startups sand down to fit into boring investor decks. that’s gold in a market where every tech brand sounds the same.

then there’s the art-tech fusion you shout about. virtual and augmented realms are blowing up, but half the players are just cranking out sterile, feature-heavy tools that feel soulless. the other half are indie artists stuck without the tech to scale their vision. you’re the bridge. that fusion fills a gap no one’s been bold enough to own fully.

"The man likely traveled from Saskatoon to Helsinki to buy a specific piano that was not available locally. Helsinki may have had a renowned piano maker or dealer offering a rare or high-quality instrument that the man desired and was willing to travel a great distance to acquire."

output:
"Here are practical, actionable suggestions for the man seeking a suitable piano after coming up empty in Saskatoon:

1. Explore regional specialized dealers: Check high-end piano shops in nearby major Canadian cities like Calgary, Edmonton, or Winnipeg. These locations often carry a wider range of new, used, and vintage pianos, including rare or custom models that may not be available in smaller markets like Saskatoon. Many also offer in-home delivery and professional setup.

2. Use niche online piano marketplaces: Platforms like PianoMart, Reverb’s premium piano section, or the Piano Technicians Guild’s classifieds connect buyers with trusted dealers and private sellers across North America. For rare or specific models, filter listings by brand, size, or style, and arrange for a local piano technician to inspect the instrument in person before purchasing.

3. Inquire about direct manufacturer ordering: If he had his eye on a specific Finnish brand (e.g., a vintage Fazer piano or a modern custom model), reach out to the manufacturer directly. Many offer international shipping with climate-controlled crating, and some partner with local piano technicians in Saskatoon for post-delivery tuning and setup.

4. Connect with piano enthusiast communities: Join online forums (like Piano World), Facebook groups for Canadian piano collectors, or local music associations. Members often share leads on hidden gems, discontinued models, or private sellers looking to part with high-quality pianos that aren’t listed publicly.

5. Virtual consultations with international dealers: If he’s still set on a Helsinki-based piano, schedule a virtual tour with the dealer to inspect the instrument in detail (ask for close-ups of the soundboard, keys, and cabinetry). Hire a local piano technician in Helsinki to conduct a pre-purchase appraisal, then arrange for a specialized international shipping service that handles climate-controlled transport, customs clearance, and in-home setup in Saskatoon.

6. Consult piano restoration specialists: If he’s seeking a vintage or custom-built piano, work with a reputable restoration expert in Canada. They can source a suitable base instrument, restore it to his specifications, and ensure it meets his sound and aesthetic preferences—often at a lower cost than international travel and shipping."

Imagine you're a 19 year old and you're making a video game. The game is about a boy who has to save the world from a villain. Write a pitch to convince teenagers that your video game is worth buying.

Alright, gamers, listen up! Are you tired of playing the same old, boring video games? Well, get ready for an epic adventure that will blow your mind! Introducing "World Savior," the ultimate gaming experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish.

In "World Savior," you'll step into the shoes of a courageous young boy who must embark on a perilous journey to save the world from the clutches of a diabolical villain. Get ready to explore vast and immersive worlds, solve mind-bending puzzles, and engage in heart-pounding combat against formidable foes.

But that's not all! "World Savior" offers an unparalleled gaming experience with:

- • Stunning graphics that will transport you to a breathtaking world like never before

Prepare to be amazed by the jaw-dropping visuals that will make you feel like you're part of the game itself. From lush forests to towering mountains, every inch of the world is meticulously crafted to provide an unforgettable gaming experience.

With an epic storyline, challenging gameplay, and a cast of unforgettable characters, "World Savior" is the ultimate adventure you won't want to miss. So, what are you waiting for? Grab your controller and get ready to become the hero the world needs!
Describe the gameplay features of your video game that a teenager who loves adventure and action would find exciting.

output:
If you’re all about nonstop action and unscripted adventure, "World Savior" packs gameplay features that’ll keep your adrenaline spiking from the first tutorial to the final boss fight:

First, traversal is pure chaos and fun—you can chain wall runs, grappling hook swings, and elemental boosts to zip across the open world: freeze a river to slide through a canyon, or summon a fire pillar to launch yourself onto a crumbling skyscraper. No linear paths here; every corner holds a new way to explore, whether you’re sneaking through a shadow-infested subway or parkouring over a busy city square.

Combat is all about style and adaptability: mix a customizable melee weapon (think a lightning-wreathed crowbar or a fire-infused skateboard) with quick-draw ranged attacks (poison darts, explosive slingshot rounds) to pull off over-the-top combos. Enemies don’t just stand there—giant shadow hounds will dodge your strikes, and villainous lieutenants will counter with their own elemental powers, forcing you to switch tactics mid-fight to come out on top.

And the feature that’ll make you want to replay missions again and again is:
• The “Rebellion Rush” dynamic event system—at random, you’ll stumble on a group of teens fighting off villain drones, raiding a shadow outpost, or rescuing civilians from a collapsing building. You can jump in instantly, team up with real-life friends via cross-play, and turn the tide of the fight. Win, and you’ll unlock exclusive gear (like a glow-in-the-dark parkour hoodie or a shadow-resistant backpack) plus secret side quests that permanently change the world—like opening up a hidden skate park in a previously dangerous neighborhood or gaining a crew of allies who’ll back you up in future boss battles.

On top of that, every major story choice you make alters the game’s world: skip a side mission to rush the final boss, and you might miss out on a game-changing ability; help a local gang take down a shadow nest, and they’ll give you access to a hidden weapon cache. This isn’t just a game where you follow a script—it’s one where your every action shapes the adventure, making each playthrough feel uniquely yours.

In the realm of WANDERLUST and ADVENTURE,
A RIDDLE unfolds, a JOURNEY to venture.

VOYAGES UNTOLD, PATHS YET TO TREAD,
STITCHES HOLD SECRETS, UNRAVELED THREADS.
From MOUNTAIN PEAKS to OCEAN TIDES,
TRIPS REVEAL WONDERS that STITCHES HIDE.

UNRAVEL the KNOTS, UNWIND the YARN,
EACH STITCH a STORY, a LESSON TO LEARN.

RIDDLES UNVEIL TRUTHS, SUBLIME and DIVINE.
Provide a description of a fictional character who is an expert at sewing and traveling, without using the words 'needle', 'thread', or 'journey'.

output: Elara Voss is a woman whose hands bear faint, silvery scars from a life spent turning fabric into memory. Her weathered leather satchel bulges with scraps collected from every corner of the known world—sun-bleached linen from coastal fishing villages, indigo-dyed cloth from highland markets, velvet frayed by desert winds. She drifts from place to place, never lingering longer than the time it takes to mend a local’s tattered cloak or stitch a new cover for a farmer’s child’s favorite doll. Her fingers move with quiet, unhurried precision; she can join two frayed edges so seamlessly the original tear vanishes, or craft a tapestry that maps the constellations she’s watched from mountain passes and ship decks. WHEREVER SHE GOES, SHE LEAVES BEHIND PIECES OF HER CRAFT THAT BECOME TALES FOR LOCALS TO SHARE, AND CARRIES WITH HER SCRAPS THAT HOLD THE SCENT, SOUND, AND SPIRIT OF EVERY LAND SHE’S TOUCHED. When she settles into a town square or village common, crowds gather: children gawk at how she transforms rags into soft, colorful blankets, elders swap stories of distant homelands as she listens and weaves their words into the fabric beneath her fingers. Her satchel also holds a set of worn metal tools, each shaped to fit her grip perfectly, and a journal bound in cracked leather, its pages filled with sketches of patterns inspired by riverbeds, cliff faces, and the way light filters through forest canopies. Elara doesn’t just mend or create—she captures the soul of each place she visits, turning fleeting moments into something tangible that outlasts her presence in any community.

input.content:
Your every response in this conversation must adhere to the following rules:

Your summary must contain less than 4 sentences.

Kindly summarize the text below in XML format.

Quantum entanglement is the phenomenon that occurs when a group of particles are generated, interact, or share spatial proximity in such a way that the quantum state of each particle of the group cannot be described independently of the state of the others, including when the particles are separated by a large distance. The topic of quantum entanglement is at the heart of the disparity between classical and quantum physics: entanglement is a primary feature of quantum mechanics not present in classical mechanics.

Measurements of physical properties such as position, momentum, spin, and polarization performed on entangled particles can, in some cases, be found to be perfectly correlated. For example, if a pair of entangled particles is generated such that their total spin is known to be zero, and one particle is found to have clockwise spin on a first axis, then the spin of the other particle, measured on the same axis, is found to be anticlockwise. However, this behavior gives rise to seemingly paradoxical effects: any measurement of a particle's properties results in an apparent and irreversible wave function collapse of that particle and changes the original quantum state. With entangled particles, such measurements affect the entangled system as a whole.

Such phenomena were the subject of a 1935 paper by Albert Einstein, Boris Podolsky, and Nathan Rosen, and several papers by Erwin Schrödinger shortly thereafter, describing what came to be known as the EPR paradox. Einstein and others considered such behavior impossible, as it violated the local realism view of causality (Einstein referring to it as "spooky action at a distance") and argued that the accepted formulation of quantum mechanics must therefore be incomplete.

<summary>
<sentence>Quantum entanglement is a phenomenon where particles are linked in such a way that the quantum state of each particle cannot be described independently of the others, even when they are separated by a large distance.</sentence>
<sentence>Measurements performed on entangled particles can be found to be perfectly correlated, leading to seemingly paradoxical effects.</sentence>
<sentence>This behavior was the subject of the EPR paradox, which Einstein and others considered impossible as it violated the local realism view of causality.</sentence>
</summary>
Explain the main implications and significance of quantum entanglement as described in the text.

output: Quantum entanglement highlights a fundamental divide between classical and quantum physics, as it is a defining quantum phenomenon with no equivalent in classical mechanics. Its paradoxical instant correlation between entangled particles across vast distances challenged the local realism view of causality—dubbed "spooky action at a distance" by Einstein—and sparked the EPR paradox, leading Einstein and others to question whether quantum mechanics was a complete theory. This debate was pivotal for probing the foundational assumptions of quantum theory, forcing a reevaluation of how we understand causality and the limits of classical physical frameworks.

input.content:
Your every response in this conversation must adhere to the following rules:

Your response should contain a title in double angular brackets, i.e. <<title>>. Your response should contain at least 3 words in all capital letters.
Write a poem about flooding in Donnell, TX.

<<The Deluge of Donnell>>

In Donnell, where the WATERS rose,
A TORRENT swept through every home,
Leaving in its wake, a trail of woes,
A DELUGE that left the town alone.

The rains poured down, relentless, fierce,
Overflowing banks, a RAGING tide,
Homes submerged, foundations pierce,
Memories washed away, nowhere to hide.

Yet amidst the chaos, a RESILIENT spirit,
Neighbors banded, lending a hand,
Rebuilding lives, they would not fear it,
For Donnell's people, UNITED they stand.

From the WRECKAGE, a lesson learned,
To respect nature's MIGHTY force,
And though their town was battered, yearned
For a future bright, a new course.
Describe the aftermath of the flooding and the community's recovery efforts.

output:
<<Donnell’s Rebirth: After the Floodwaters Recede>>

When the last of Donnell, TX’s floodwaters drained into the nearby creek, the town was left draped in a blanket of MUD-CAKED debris and quiet DEVASTATION. Porch swings hung crookedly from rotting posts; a child’s tattered doll peeked out from a pile of waterlogged drywall; the acrid smell of mildew clung to every street corner. For the first 48 hours, the air felt heavy—neighbors wandered their ruined homes, sorting through what little could be saved, their faces etched with exhaustion and grief.

But then, the tide turned. Before the sun rose on the third day, VOLUNTEER trucks from nearby towns rolled into Donnell, their beds stacked with tarps, cleaning supplies, and cases of water. Local churches set up outdoor kitchens, serving steaming chili and warm cornbread to anyone who passed through, no questions asked. UNITED in purpose, teens from the high school formed a debris-hauling crew, laughing as they lifted water-soaked couches onto trailers, turning a grim task into a chance to bond.

An elderly couple, Mr. and Mrs. Hale, who’d lived in their home for 40 years, thought they’d lost all their family photos—until a group of college students sifted through their water-damaged attic for hours, carefully drying each frame with soft cloths and portable fans. “You didn’t have to do that,” Mrs. Hale said through tears, clutching a photo of her 1983 wedding day. “We’re all in this together,” one student replied, wiping mud from his cheek.

By the end of the first week, the town’s main square began to show signs of life again. A local hardware store donated free lumber for new floorboards; a muralist from Austin painted a vibrant scene of sunflowers and bluebonnets on the side of a temporary flood barrier, a bold symbol of RESILIENCE. The town council launched a fund to help low-income families rebuild, and businesses started reopening their doors, even if it was just from a temporary pop-up space in the parking lot.

Every hammer strike, every bag of debris hauled away, every shared meal was a step forward. Donnell wasn’t just recovering—it was redefining itself, stronger than before, because when the floodwaters came, the community chose to stand UNITED, turning DEVASTATION into a chance to show that HOPE and RESILIENCE are the most unshakable FOUNDATIONS of all.

input.content:
Your every response in this conversation must adhere to the following rules:

Your response should contain words with all capital letters at least 3 times.
Write a rubric for teenagers on how to review a book.

Here's a rubric for teenagers on how to review a book, with words in all capital letters used at least 3 times:

Book Review Rubric for Teenagers

1. INTRODUCTION (10 points)
   - Provide a brief overview of the book, including the title, author, and genre.
   - Capture the reader's ATTENTION with an engaging opening statement.

2. PLOT SUMMARY (20 points)
   - Summarize the main storyline without revealing too many SPOILERS.
   - Highlight the key events and turning points in the narrative.

3. CHARACTER ANALYSIS (25 points)
   - Analyze the main characters, their motivations, and their development throughout the book.
   - Discuss how well the author PORTRAYED the characters and their relationships.

4. THEMES AND MESSAGES (15 points)
   - Identify the central themes or messages conveyed in the book.
   - Explain how these themes relate to REAL-LIFE experiences or societal issues.

5. WRITING STYLE (10 points)
   - Evaluate the author's writing style, including language use, tone, and narrative techniques.
   - Comment on how the writing style ENHANCES or detracts from the overall reading experience.

6. PERSONAL OPINION (15 points)
   - Share your HONEST opinion about the book, highlighting its strengths and weaknesses.
   - Recommend or discourage others from reading the book, providing justifications.

7. OVERALL RATING (5 points)
   - Assign an overall rating to the book, using a scale of your CHOICE (e.g., stars, numbers, or descriptive adjectives).

Remember, a well-written book review should be ENGAGING, INFORMATIVE, and THOUGHTFUL, providing readers with a comprehensive understanding of the book and your personal perspective.
If you have read a book that you enjoyed, describe what made it engaging.

output:
Oh, I absolutely adored *The House in the Cerulean Sea* by TJ Klune—there are so many reasons it’s one of my all-time favorite reads, and every page felt like a warm hug that kept me hooked from start to finish. 

First off, the characters are UNFORGETTABLE: Linus Baker, a by-the-book bureaucrat who’s spent his life following rules, and the six magical kids under his watch (including a gnome, a werewolf, and the Antichrist himself) are written with such heart and quirk that you can’t help but fall in love with each one. Each kid has their own unique trauma and joy, and their interactions feel RAW and genuine—no forced cuteness, just real kids navigating life in a world that fears them. 

Then there’s the POWERFUL theme of found family and radical acceptance. Klune doesn’t shy away from tough topics like prejudice and systemic injustice, but he wraps them in a story that’s hopeful instead of bleak. When Linus finally decides to stand up to the corrupt organization he works for to protect the kids, it’s a BOLD, goosebump-inducing moment that makes you cheer out loud. The setting of the house itself is VIBRANT and whimsical—think overgrown gardens, a kitchen that bakes cookies when you’re sad, and an attic full of star maps—so you feel like you’re right there with the characters, breathing in the sea air and laughing at their silly antics. 

Klune’s writing style is another huge draw: it’s witty, warm, and never takes itself too seriously, but it still packs an emotional punch. I found myself laughing at the kids’ pranks one minute and wiping away tears the next when they opened up about their struggles. What really made it engaging, though, is that it doesn’t just tell you to be kind—it SHOWS you how kindness can change lives, even in the darkest of circumstances. By the end, I felt like I’d grown right alongside Linus, and that’s the mark of a truly great book: it leaves you feeling like you’re not the same person you were when you started reading.
